job.title: Software Engineer (Remote to start)
job.description: At Flylance we have fun doing what we love by providing superb experience speed quality and cost We empower our Flylancers to take on challenging assignments and roles with an elevated level of responsibility in our agile working environment Our people make us who we are and we provide incredible service and experiences that empower us to think outside the boxbrbrCheck us out at wwwflylancecombrbrstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongOur clients amazing Fixed Income Front Office technology team is looking for a software engineer to help build a suite of nextgeneration cloudnative applications In this role you will engineer and develop new capabilities using modern cloud technologies for use by our Portfolio Managers and Quantitative AnalystsbrbrThis is a handson fullstack role providing opportunities to solve complex business and technical problems You will be a key contributor throughout the entire product lifecycle capable of working individually or in collaboration with othersbrbrYou will work with smart talented people across our business We will expect you to be agile show leadership and think outside the box In return well give you challenging work that has an impact gives opportunities for you to learn and grow and to do so in a collaborative supportive environmentbrbrstronguTop Skillsbrustrongul liExperience with asset managementli
